pl.bristleback.server.bristle.security.authentication

Class AuthenticationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.bristleback.server.bristle.security.authentication.AuthenticationConfiguration

  • public class AuthenticationConfiguration
extends Object
    This class contains configuration used by the system authentication framework.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuthenticationConfiguration

    • Method Detail

      • getMaximumAuthenticationsPerUsername

        public int getMaximumAuthenticationsPerUsername()
        Gets maximum concurrent, valid authentications for each username. If not specified by application creator, value of this property is equal to 0, which means there is no limit of concurrent valid authentications.
        Returns:
        maximum concurrent authentications registered for each username.

      • setMaximumAuthenticationsPerUsername

        public void setMaximumAuthenticationsPerUsername(int maximumAuthenticationsPerUsername)
        Sets maximum concurrent authentications registered for each username. If specified value is set to 0, then no limit of concurrent valid authentications is applied.
        Parameters:
        maximumAuthenticationsPerUsername - maximum number of concurrent authentications.
